site_name: 381A-D INC, 381-397 INC and 13-20 Park Parade Mansion, Edgware Road, Kingsbury, London, NW9
description: Variation of conditions 2 (Planning Drawings & Supporting Statement), 3 (South-East Facing Windows), 6 (Drainage Strategy), 11 (Ecology), 13 (Air Quality Assessment), 14 (Unit Mix), 15 (Commercial Floorspace), 16 (Construction Method Statement), 17 (Construction Logistics Plan), 18 (Fire strategy), 19 (Historical Recording), 20 (Piling Method Statement), 21 (District Heating Network), 22 (Site Investigation), 28 (Management Plan), 29 (Cycle Parking), 31 (Delivery & Servicing Management Plan) and 33 (Commencement of Class A3 Use) Full Planning Permission reference 17/2284 dated 02/07/2021 for Demolition of existing buildings and erection of a new mixed use building comprising commercial uses and residential units, with associated car parking, cycle storage, plant and shared external amenity space at first and fifth floor level with other ancillary works. Subject to a legal agreement dated the 2nd of July 2021.
